sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useParams, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { deletecart } from '../../actions' import { updatecart } from '../../actions'; function Itemcart({ item , count }) { let counter = count - 1 const dispatch = useDispatch() const onDelete = (id) => { dispatch(deletecart({ id: id })); history.push('/'); }; return (
{item.name}

{item.description}

Quantity

{item.price} THB

); } Itemcart.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.object.isRequired, count: PropTypes.number.isRequired }; export default Itemcart
